page.title: 08PACKINGTON ESTATE,ISLINGTON
page.content: The Packington Estate is 15 years old.The flats are in good condition now.A few years ago they were thinking of pulling them down because they were sinking.We had no hot water or heating for five months so we had to use immersion heaters.Three months after we had new central heating fitted in.The flats started to let in rain.The roofs were re-tarred and this took 7 months. We then all had new gas meters fitted. Then we had squatters in some of the flats but now they have been evicted. There are nearly 700 flats on the estate and at present the outsides are being re-decorated.They may build a community hall if they can find the space.I like living there and have some good friends but I don't like the gangs of boys hanging round the flats at night.We need more places for youth.
